001package Calibration_Demos;
002
003import ij.IJ;
004import ij.ImagePlus;
005import ij.io.LogStream;
006import ij.plugin.PlugIn;
007import imagingbook.calibration.data.zhang.CalibrationImage;
008import imagingbook.core.resource.ImageResource;
009
010/**
011 * Opens Zhang's standard calibration images as a stack of RGB images. 
012 * The image data are stored as a resource in the local Java class tree.
013 * This plugin also demonstrates the use of the resource access
014 * mechanism.
015 * 
016 * @author W. Burger
017 * @version 2021-08-22
018 *
019 */
020public class Open_Test_Images implements PlugIn {
021        
022        static {
023                LogStream.redirectSystem();
024        }
025        
026        static ImageResource resource = CalibrationImage.CalibImageStack_tif;
027
028        public void run(String args) {
029                
030                if (resource == null) {
031                        IJ.error("Could not find resource " + resource);
032                        return;
033                }
034                
035                if(resource.isInsideJar())
036                        IJ.log("Resources from JAR file: " + resource.getURL());
037                else
038                        IJ.log("Resources from regular file: " + resource.getURL());
039                
040                ImagePlus im = resource.getImage();
041                if (im != null) {
042                        im.show();
043                }
044                else {
045                        IJ.error("Could not open image " + resource);
046                }
047        }
048        
049}
